txt.en: Explore the ruins of the ancient city of Annúminas.
Find the Markers of the Sunken City
Explore the ruins of ancient Arnor.

Once the capital of the North, Evendim has nonetheless always had its wild places and mysteries -- and those have grown stranger and more dangerous still in the long years since Annúminas was abandoned.\n\nFar across the waters of lake Evendim lie lands long unexplored by Men.
Find the marker plaques scattered throughout Annúminas.

The kings of Annúminas were intered within tombs along the road to the gate of the city.\n\nNine were the kings that ruled over Arnor from this ancient seat of power, but not all of them were buried in the Way of Kings...
Explore the wilds of Evendim, the tombs of the kings that ruled over Arnor, and the ruins of the ancient city of Annúminas.
Explore the City of the Kings
